Location, Location, Location!
Enjoy Intown Living in a "Quiet Forest-Like Setting"
2br+ 1.5ba with Gleaming  Hardwood Floors located in the  "Heart of the City of Decatur, Oakhurst

Central Heat + Air, Walk-In Closets, Balcony or Patio, Ceramic Tile Baths, Window Blinds and More!
Because we're located at the end of a cul-de-sac there is "No-Through Traffic"
City of Decatur Schools

Convenient to: Emory, Oakhurst, Downtown Atlanta, Buckhead,  Midtown, Kirkwood, Virginia Highland, Highlands, Old Fourth Ward, 4th, Candler Park, CDC, Druid Hills, Children's Hospital and  Emory Hospital.

Laundry room located inside the building so there's no need to go outside
Must have Good Credit (725-750) and Good Refs.
Lower credit scores (725)may require a higher security deposit.
Sorry cats allowed only in some units.
No Dogs.
Please note that the Craigslist reply often malfunctions
So if you're seriously interested, text 67eight nine 33 seven 4 8eight!
In order to distinguish your response from Spam please include your name, occupation, your contact number so I can text you,  how many people and when you need to move.
I can only respond to inquiries that include this information.
